backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a chat application backend with user profile management, chat session CRUD, and message storage, all protected by role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented mobile-responsiveness features (sidebar collapse, touch targets, input visibility, mobile-first layout) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short descriptions for each frontend source file, summarizing the mobile-first UI improvements, hooks, context, and component responsibilities across the React app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes covering colors, borders, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the INC.ai React app with a root div and a module script entry point to src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing authentication state, profile loading, and mobile sidebar open/close state, rendering the appropriate screen (login, profile setup, or main chat layout) with a responsive overlay backdrop.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that renders the message list, message input, and session title bar, and handles sending messages to the AI while scrolling to the bottom when the mobile keyboard opens.
frontend/src/components/DeleteSessionDia: Alert dialog for confirming session deletion with full-width stacked buttons on mobile, 48px minimum button heights, and integration with the delete session mutation and active session context.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Displays a branded empty state screen with the INC.ai logo and optional feature hint cards (multi-session, instant AI, secure) when no session is selected or no messages exist.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header showing the INC.ai logo, a mobile sidebar toggle button, the authenticated user's avatar/name, and the LoginButton component.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and loading state based on authentication status.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Full-page login screen displaying the INC.ai brand, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/Message.tsx: Renders a single chat message with distinct styling for user (right-aligned, red bubble) and AI (left-aligned with avatar) roles, including a formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea input bar with a send button, keyboard shortcut (Enter), error display, and mobile scroll-into-view behavior on focus.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Scrollable list of Message components with a typing indicator and auto-scroll to the latest message; shows EmptyState when no messages are present.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves it via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/SessionItem.tsx: Sidebar list item representing a chat session with active highlighting, selection handling, and a hover-revealed delete button that opens a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component that lists chat sessions and provides a 'New Chat' button, supporting both desktop (collapsible) and mobile (overlay) layouts.
Displays an animated three-dot typing indicator with an AI avatar, used to show that the AI is generating a response.
frontend/src/context/ChatContext.tsx: React context that stores and exposes the currently active chat session name along with a setter function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profile management, chat session CRUD, message retrieval, and AI message sending.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind, custom CSS variables for the dark theme, typography, scrollbar styling, and a typing-bounce animation.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the INC.ai frontend, extending the default theme with custom colors (oklch-based dark surfaces, red accents), fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state for INC.ai (version 5), documenting existing features, architectural notes (Pollinations AI, Internet Identity auth), and build context for a ChatGPT-style dark-themed chatbot on ICP.
